resources.string: Graphic Designer at LPDP Kemenkeu RI

Full Time Graphic Designer who responsible for daily graphic design content for a medium-sized government institution. Worked regularly on graphic, data visualization, branding, and social media material. Top 10 on the Bandung Visualthon 2015: Infographic Competition. Developed 180+ graphic design projects (data visualizations, brand identity, infographics, social media contents) that increased brand implementation by 20%.
